mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT
FROM sys_menu a JOIN sys_menu_role mr on a.id = mr.menu_id JOIN sys_role r on mr.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id JOIN sys_user u on ur.user_id = u.id AND u.id = #{id} WHERE a.delflag =#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND r.delflag =#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND u.delflag =#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
